solution_line_template: The chips cost ${chip_cost_per_bag} a bag and he buys them {days_per_week_bought} days a week so that's {chip_cost_per_bag}*{days_per_week_bought} = $<<{chip_cost_per_bag}*{days_per_week_bought}={weekly_cost}>>{weekly_cost} a week
If he spends ${weekly_cost} on chips a week then over {num_weeks} weeks he will spend {weekly_cost}*{num_weeks} = $<<{weekly_cost}*{num_weeks}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} on chips
